types.html:
sabbataire (plural sabbataires)

  1. Relating to the celebration of God on the day of Sabbath
    l'hérésie sabbataire.
trans: Relating to the celebration of God on the day of Sabbath
Relating to the celebration of God on the day of Sabbath

types.html:
sabbataire m (plural sabbataires)

  1. Christianized Jew who would respect the day of Sabbath
  2. Sabbatarian, Christian respecting the day of Sabbath because it is not formally abolished by the Scriptures
    les sabbataires rejetaient le dimanche et fêtaient le samedi.

Synonyms

[edit]
  • sabbatiste
trans: Christianized Jew who would respect the day of Sabbath
Sabbatarian, Christian respecting the day of Sabbath because it is not formally abolished by the Scriptures
Christianized Jew who would respect the day of Sabbath
Sabbatarian, Christian respecting the day of Sabbath because it is not formally abolished by the Scriptures
